description:
What's gold, weighs a tonne and if it fell out of the sky it would kill you? My new Space Marine Captain with Jump Pack! In today's post we'll take a closer look at why I'm ditching my old Captain for a shiny new one, why he's a Codex Space Marine Captain and not a Blood Angel Codex Captain, why he has a massive tactical rock and finally, we'll check out the painting guide, so if you want to paint your own shiny golden boy stay around until the end.

The post Showcase: Blood Angels Captain (inc. painting guide) appeared first on Tale of Painters.
title: Showcase: Blood Angels Captain (inc. painting guide)
